official_name: Commonwealth Distance Learning Scholarships for Candidates from Least Developed Countries
introduction: This scholarship allows talented and motivated individuals to access high-quality training and educational opportunities by studying for a UK Master's degree by distance learning.

eligibility_criteria.citizenship: Must be a citizen of or refugee in a Commonwealth country
eligibility_criteria.residency: Must be permanently resident in a developing Commonwealth country
eligibility_criteria.academic_requirements: Hold a first degree of at least upper second class (2:1) standard

scholarship_benefits.additional: Study grants for course-related costs (internet, books, etc.)

steps: Secure admission in a participating UK University
Apply through the CSC online application system
